resources.string: Press the button below to make sure that this input method is enabled.
Load gestures from internal storage (if available)
Default Gesture Strokes (scrolls and pinch to zoom)
Press the button below to make sure that changes to gesture files or sources are appplied. Force stop of the app will also work.
Please note that the lion\'s share of the credit for this app must go to its original developer. His project/code is located here: https://github.com/tmatz/android-unistroke-keyboard
Use cheat sheet images as gesture backgrounds
